sentences.en: "Human beings were small, defenseless and vulnerable to predators, " says Barbara J. King, biological anthropologist at the College of William and Mary and author of Evolving God.
sentences.cn: “人类对掠食者而言是弱小、无力防御与易受伤害的，”威廉学院生物人类学家、《进化之神》的作者芭芭拉.J.金说。

sentences.en: A city without guns or water is defenseless before an army.
sentences.cn: 无枪炮或缺水的城市在大军围攻时是无法自卫的.

sentences.en: But in his book or his picture the real man delivers himself defenseless.
sentences.cn: 但是在他写的书、画的画里面,他却毫无防范地把自己显露出来.

sentences.en: Cover my defenseless head With the shadow of Thy wing.
sentences.cn: 可怜我身无荫庇,愿主思翼常遮盖.

sentences.en: He realized that he had been cruel to shoot defenseless birds.
sentences.cn: 他醒悟到自己杀了那么多无助的鸟儿,实在太残忍.

sentences.en: It is an emotion which is defenseless against passion.
sentences.cn: 在冲动的热情前面,这种感情是毫无防卫能力的.

sentences.en: My tears fall , bewildered at the thought of her, defenseless.
sentences.cn: 泪如雨下, 全不知羞愧,只因想到她.

sentences.en: People think it a serious crime to attack defenseless children.
sentences.cn: 人们认为攻击手无寸铁的儿童是一种严重的罪行.

sentences.en: Ralph stood up, feeling curiously defenseless with the darkness pressing in.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫站了起来, 随着暮色逐渐深沉,他产生了一种奇怪的失去防护的感觉.

sentences.en: So there I was, defenseless down with my robe over my head, my underclothes display.
sentences.cn: 这就是我当时那无助的局面, 我的长袍子盖到了我的脸上,内衣全都露了出来.

sentences.en: The bandits descended on the defenseless village.
sentences.cn: 匪徒突袭无防御的村庄.

sentences.en: The bandits descended upon the defenseless village.
sentences.cn: 匪徒袭击无防御的村庄.

sentences.en: They also suggest that the sounds may function to attract the attention of predators, in which case the intruder would be rather defenseless.
sentences.cn: 同时，还指出，这种声音还会吸引来食肉动物，在这样的情况下，入侵者在防御上就会处于明显的弱势。

sentences.en: They are utterly devoid of conscience , they even humiliated these defenseless civilians.
sentences.cn: 欺辱这些手无寸铁的平民,这些人真是丧尽天良.
我们寻衅好斗, 但又毫无防卫能力.

sentences.en: Why were those people living in this defenseless place?
sentences.cn: 为什么那些人要住在这个毫无防卫的地方?

sentences.en: With a powerful left hook he knocked his challenger defenseless.
sentences.cn: 他用一记重重的左钩拳将对手打得失去了防卫能力.

sentences.en: Without Christ we are defenseless against the Devil, but with "the helmet of salvation" our minds are protected by God.
sentences.cn: 没有基督，我们无力防御魔鬼的攻击；但有救恩的头盔，我们的心思便有神的保护。

words.tran_cn: 卫冕的；防御中的；防守型的
防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备
防卫者，守卫者；辩护者；拥护者；卫冕者
防卫，防护；防御措施；防守；vt. 谋划抵御

trans.tran_cn: <主美>无防御的，无保护的，不能自卫的，手无寸铁
